strIntroduction: 遠離曼谷市區，來場歷史意義的祕境深度旅行。欣賞北碧府的秀麗風景；二次大戰所遺留下來的桂河大橋、具有死亡鐵路之稱的泰緬鐵道、還可以在Safari進行竹筏漂流、騎大象等精彩體驗！

strIntroduction: Follow KKday to have a nice Snorkeling Trip at Koh Chang ! Enjoy the beauty of the ocean and unlimited vistas, you are about to lose yourself in this ocean wonderland.

strIntroduction: Enjoy a private sunset cruise on board ! If you are looking for a private and personalized experience, you can book our yachts exclusively for yourself and your family, friends, colleagues, team mates or service club members as part of a private charter !

strIntroduction: Enjoy the best in Thai cuisine with Thai music and classical Thai dances.
strTitle: Chao Phraya Wan Fah River Cruise

strIntroduction: 熱門景點芭達雅的全新玩法，乘坐豪華雙體船巡遊海上風光，暢玩周邊三大無人島，體驗獨家私房白色沙灘！

strIntroduction: Whilst you’re on holiday in Thailand why not experience the biggest thrill of your life? Feel the amazing rush by bungee jumping off a 60 metre high platform over a lake!

strIntroduction: Escape the crowds with our sit-on top kayak! Paddle yourself around some of the Island in Krabi , koh Hong, koh Lading, Koh Pak bia, and Mor Islands most dramatic and beautiful coastlines and in Krabi's peaceful Andaman Sea.
strTitle: Krabi "A Day In The Islands"

strIntroduction: There are many snorkel trips to Koh Tao on offer from Koh Samui but The Dive Academy provide the ultimate, value for money, VIP Snorkeling Tour on our purpose built speedboat "Midnight Blue".
strTitle: VIP Snorkeling Trip

strIntroduction: Make a reservation of your private transfer and get ready to enjoy your travel in Thailand!
strTitle: Chiang Mai to Chiang Rai Private Transfers

strIntroduction: Have fun and learn the traditional Thai Cooking taught by our very own chef. This is an ideal “easy and relax” learning environment where you can discover your cooking skills in a real hands-on cooking class that is set-up in a tranquil and serene surrounding.
strTitle: Cooking Class at 5 Star Kala Samui Resort

strIntroduction: Let's Relax Pattaya 'Eastern Affinity' is a day spa in Pattaya, a place where you can indulge in a heavenly and carefree retreat of the tropical garden and the beautiful pond amidst the colorful city of Pattaya and effortlessly explore for a more jovial journeys and attractions.
strTitle: Let's Relax Spa Voucher (Pattaya)

strIntroduction: Wreck diving is one of the most exciting parts of diving! Explore an old ship wreck, somewhere out in the open sea. Who knows which mysterious reason made it sink?!
strTitle: 1 Day Dive Trip (2 dives) – Wreck Special

strIntroduction: New to diving? No problem! Practice the basics within an open water dive under full supervision of a dive leader.
strTitle: Introductory Dive (Phi Phi)

strIntroduction: Combine big time caving and world-class ziplining with a Homestay in a mountain tribe village for thrills beyond the imagination. Only in Thailand will you go high above and far below the amazing rainforest canopy with this popular adventure. Rappel 30 meters into a gaping black hole, fly between 33 platforms on ziplines, and experience Thai culture and food from inside the home of villager.
strTitle: Cave Exploring and Zipline 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: Snorkel the white sand islands of Poda, Tup Islets, and Chicken Island, and watch a spectacular sunset in the Andaman Sea on an 8-hour tour from Krabi. Feast on an authentic barbecue dinner far from the hustle and bustle of the mainland.
strTitle: Krabi Romantic Sunset Cruise

strIntroduction: Mimosa Pattaya or "The City of Love" is a new style of attraction on over 20 acres in Pattaya. The place offers a perfect combination of French style of architecture boasting its elegant shopping atmosphere and glamorous Broadway musicals and the colourful Cabaret Show which what Pattaya is famous for.
strTitle: Mimosa Pattaya Entrance Pass

strIntroduction: Experience two of Phuket's highlights during one day! The morning will be spent on the white sandy beach of Racha Yai island and for lunch we head to the privacy of Mai Ton Island.
strTitle: Racha and Honeymoon Island One day Tour by Speed Boat (Chinese Guide) with Love Andaman

strIntroduction: 最近非常熱門的3D立體視覺博物館，也在曼谷開幕了哦！最佳殺底片的好去處，好玩好拍好好逛！
strTitle: Bangkok Art in Paradise 3D Museum Pass

strIntroduction: Just a short hop east of Chiang Mai we head away from the tourist trail and into fertile valleys that offer inspiring views and mountainous horizons not seen from the city. After a short drive from the city we start our bicycle exploration of Sankampaeng and the beautiful, peaceful Lanna countryside.
strTitle: Bike Through Lanna Countryside

strIntroduction: Like Cabaret show, Muay Thai Boxing is also a must see when you visit Thailand. Come to watch Sainamyen Boxing and enjoy this exciting game.
strTitle: Sainamyen Boxing Entrance Pass

strIntroduction: Coral and marine life around Koh Talu is very impressive. For diving lover, this is a place worth visiting!
strTitle: Talu Island Scuba Diving 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: Gibbons Love Elephants! Flight of the GibbonTM has teamed up with an elephant sanctuary to bring you an exciting two day tour program. You will spend the first day enjoying learning about elephants and spending some time with them. The second day, you’ll take on the highest rated zipline in Asia on your zipline canopy tour.
strTitle: Elephant Sanctuary and Zipline 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: If you love golf, this is one course you must experience. Play one of Thailand's top golf courses, voted among the top new golf courses in Asia. Enjoy a night in a 5-­star villa followed by a Zipline Canopy Tour and create a vacation within your Thai vacation!
strTitle: Golf and Zipline 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: Get an exciting adventure! Using 4X4 to go around the island and having lots of different experience!
strTitle: Koh Samui Jungle Safari Full Day

strIntroduction: Ko Tachai, Ko Bon (2 islands of the Similan Islands National Marine Park ) and Premchai Wreck, with KKday and Sea Bees Diving you can dive these amazing sites in one day! Hop on board of the MC Stingray, Khao Lak’s state of the art high speed Catamaran. This trip is perfect for people who love to dive in warm seawater and relax on one of Thailand's most beautiful destinations: Khao Lak!
strTitle: Dive into the Deep with Sea Bees － Explore Khao Lak's Top 3 Dive Sites in 1 Day!

strIntroduction: "Phuket's wettest wildest water park" providing gallons of excitement for the whole family!

strIntroduction: Ride as high as you can in Thailand when taking on this challenging cycle of 20 kms and some 2000 m of ascent up to the top of the country's tallest mountain – Doi Inthanon. Then comes the reward of the longest and smoothest descent in Thailand!

strIntroduction: One of the most popular tour from Koh Lanta, showing you 4 unique islands where you can go snorkeling and kayaking.

strIntroduction: Phuket’s quirkiest and funniest tourist attraction.
strTitle: Phuket Upside Down House Pass

strIntroduction: During a 1989 sea caving expedition, we found Phang Nga Bay's Hongs and Tidal Sea Caves and invented the Tidal Technology that allows us to enter tidal caves by sea kayak.

strIntroduction: Discover Chiang Mai in a way they have never seen before by gliding on a Segway!

strIntroduction: Koh Phangan is an Island in the northeast of Surat Thani, about 20 kilometers from Koh Samui. Its area of 170 square kilometers, or 106,250 rai, is surrounded by several minor islands such as Koh Tao, Koh Tae Nok, Koh Tae Nai, and Koh Ma.
strTitle: Phangan Island 1 day tour

strIntroduction: If you are a PADI holder and longing for a great diving experience, this is your best choice! Get a exciting and memorable liveaboard adventure with KKday！
strTitle: 3 Days 3 Nights Dive Trip - Similan and Surin

strIntroduction: Enjoy your Pattaya holiday with fun and unique water sport activities. Have a good time while parasailing and sea walking in the morning. Soak up the sun and go for a ride with the banana boat at noon. For the food lovers, a delicious seafood lunch set will be served. We provide Mandarin, Korean and English translation service
strTitle: Pattaya Beach Fun

strIntroduction: Bor Tor is a small coastal village at the top of Phang Nga Bay. There is a good concentration of caves or karst 'hongs' that can be accessed by sit-on-top kayaks, and the geology is amazing. There isn't as much wildlife as in Talin, but Bor Tor is rich in scenery.
strTitle: Kayaking Bor Thor Full Day

strIntroduction: Embark on a journey where the glittering world of music, dance, all stars performers in glamorous glittering costume perform dances and songs to distribute different cultures form countries around the world.
strTitle: Aphrodite Cabaret Show: Discount Ticket with Transfer

strIntroduction: Mini Siam and Mini Europe is home to miniature of renowned buildings from all over the world, including Grand Palace of Thailand, Big Ben, Eiffel Tower… etc. Aside from that, it also offers various garden landscaping. The rich experience it has to offer would definitely make killer photos for your trip.
strTitle: Mini Siam and Mini Europe Pass

strIntroduction: 此趟旅程將帶您前往聖托里尼樂園、綿羊牧場、華欣火車站、往日情懷、創意市集夜市等知名特色景點，讓您不僅玩得盡興，還能體會泰國的多樣面貌！

strIntroduction: Take a Horse drawn carriage around the city center. Visit Wat Phrathat Lampang Luang, one of the northern finest temples and the best presentation of Lanna style architecture.

strIntroduction: Chiang Rai which tends to be a little more 'laid back' now competes with Chiang Mai as a tourist attraction and is fast becoming a popular escape for tourists wanting to get away from the troubles they left behind.

strIntroduction: Did you ever wished, as a kid, that you could explore the secrets of the Zoo after dark? You can explore the zoo, hearing stories about animals, and experiencing theatrical that will surprise , move and delight you.

strIntroduction: Sukhothai which literally means Dawn of Happiness, 300 kilometres from Chiang Mai, and was founded in 1238. Sukhothai was the capital of Thailand for approximately 120 years. You get to visit the best attractions in Sukhothai & Srisatchanalai Historical Park within one day.

Drive back to the Club House to enjoy a barbeque dinner by a campfire at night.
